title: Ice Skating Stars Get Special Awards
summary: Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean are famous ice skaters who won a gold medal at the Olympics long ago. They are getting special awards called a damehood and knighthood in the New Year Honours list. This list gives awards to people who do great things. Torvill and Dean are happy and feel honored. Another person, Sarina Wiegman, who coaches England's women's football team, is also getting an award. She helped the team win European championships. Other football players and rugby players are getting awards too. The New Year Honours celebrate people who work hard and achieve big things in sports and other areas.

background_read: The New Year Honours is a special event in the United Kingdom where the government gives awards to people who have done amazing things in their jobs or for the country. These awards include titles like dame or sir for women and men. People can get awards for sports, charity work, science, and more. It's a way to say thank you and celebrate their hard work. Ice skating is a sport where people perform dances and jumps on ice, and the Olympics is a big competition where the best athletes from around the world compete.
